channel.title: vsphere on IT Talks
channel.description: Recent content in vsphere on IT Talks

item.title: The data service timed out because a back-end task took more than 120
item.description:
Today I received error on my vm summary page in Vsphere web client: The data service timed out because a back-end task took more than 120 seconds. See the vsphere-client-virgo.log for more details.

Just before that I removed a test vcenter server, which was connected to my PSC  on production Vsphere instance.

You need to remove a stale vCenter Server from your SSO environment, use the cmsso-util. It may takes a long time but does the job.

item.title: Installation of component VMware Python components failed with error code ‘3010’
item.description: If you will receive the following error during vSphere 6.0a –> 6.0b updating:

item.title: VMware VSAN Health Check Plugin Installation
Chrome NPAPI Plugins re-enable
item.description: Google Chrome is phasing out support for NPAPI plugins in Chrome Version 42. So your Client Integration Plug-In in the vSphere Web Client stops working.
